DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm non-interventional study ( NIS ) evaluate effectiveness , safety quality life ( QoL ) patient advance NSCLC receive combination nab-paclitaxel carboplatin first line palliative therapy real life setting .
DOC.brief_title: Nab-Paclitaxel Combination With Carboplatin First-line Therapy Patients With NSCLC
DOC.detailed_description: The present NIS design provide additional knowledge term effectiveness , safety quality life routine administration combination nab-paclitaxel ( Abraxane® ) carboplatin first line treatment adult patient locally advanced metastatic non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) candidate potentially curative surgery / radiation therapy . The combination Abraxane® carboplatin approve Europe March 2015 base result pivotal randomize , open label phase III study 1,052 patient .
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm diagnosis locally advance / metastatic , unresectable NSCLC According SmPC According SmPC
